target_audience: Parents of infants (0-2 years old), particularly those concerned about sensitive skin and rash prevention.
color_scheme: Neutral, beige, cream, soft tones. Creates a calming and gentle mood.
composition: Product-focused, lifestyle. Shows the baby wearing the diaper in a natural setting.
special_elements: Product benefits (RashShield protection, comfortable, eco-friendly), social proof (loved by babies and parents, rated excellent by dermatologists, as seen on Babylist).
